i made this map for my geography class

properties.name: Birmingham
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballBirminghamBirmingham, AL. is where some of the most grusome activities of the civil rights era took place. In Birmingham, the whites took firehoses and shot the blacks with them. They also would drag blacks behind there cars and hung them from nooses.

properties.name: Columbine High School
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballÂ Denver, ColoradoIn 1998 at Columbine High School, two students purchased and brought guns to school and killed 13 people and wounding 25 people. After killing 11 people, the two gunman shot and killed themselves. It was a tragic event and it was very sad.

properties.name: Mt. Everest
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballNepalMt Everest is the tallest above land mountain. It was originally named Peak XV, then renamed to Mt. Everest in 1865 to honor Sir George Everest. On June 8, 1924, George Mallory and Andrew Irvine, made the first recorded attempt the mountain. Both Malloy and Irvine\'s bodys were found near an old chinese camp. Scientist do not know wether or not if they reached the top. The first official recorded group to reach the top was Sir Edmund Hillary and Tenzing Norgay in 1953.

properties.name: Navy Marine Corps Relief Society - Pearl Harbor Office
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballBuilding 1514, Pearl Harbor, HI, 96860on december 7 1949 pearl harbor was atacked by the japneese. The U.S. Fleet\'s Pearl Harbor base was reachable by an aircraft carrier force, and the Japanese Navy secretly sent one across the Pacific with greater aerial striking power than had ever been seen on the World\'s oceans. Its planes hit just before 8AM on 7 December. Within a short time five of eight battleships at Pearl Harbor were sunk or sinking, with the rest damaged. Several other ships and most Hawaii-based combat planes were also knocked out and over 2400 Americans were dead. Soon after, Japanese planes eliminated much of the American air force in the Philippines, and a Japanese Army was ashore in Malaya

properties.name: Pearl Harbor
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballBuilding 1514, Pearl Harbor, HI, 96860Pearl Harbor was the United States major naval base. Japan executed their mission perfectly, succesfully bombing and removing America\'s Navy Battleship force keeping them from hurting Japan. Japan attacked in the early morning on December 7, 1942. Japans planes hit 5 of the U.S.\'s 8 battleships causing them to sink and then damaged the 3 ships left standing. This brought the United States into World War II.

properties.name: Plymouth Rock
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballMassachusettsPlymouth Rock is where the Pilgrims and their ship, the Mayflower, landed in 1620. Plymouth Rock is currently located in Plymouth, MA.

properties.name: St. Augustine
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballFloridaSt Augustine is where the first spanish colony was formed. It was discovered by Don Juan Ponce de Leon on Easter, March 27, 1513. When he claimed it for Spain, he named it La Florida. In the 50 year span from 1513 to 1563, Spain launched 6 expeditions to settle Florida and all 6 failed. St. Augustine was founded 44 years before the English at Jamestown and 55 years before the landing at Plymoth Rock by the Pilgrims. St. Augustine is the oldest European settlement in North America.

properties.name: Virginia Tech
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballVirginiaIn 2007, a student at Virginia Tech brought two handguns and killed 33 people. He also injured 21 people then killed himself.

properties.name: World Trade Center
properties.description: Posted by RivercatbaseballNew YorkIn 2001, Al-Qaida hijacked U.S. planes and crashed them into the "twin towers". On September 11, 2001, the U.S. was struck with tragedy. Two planes that were hijacked and drove into two business center in New York City
